import { Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-qlsp', templateUrl: './qlsp.component.html', styleUrls: ['./qlsp.component.css'] }) export class QlspComponent { watch = { name: 'Đồng hồ 1', price: 100, image: 'watch1.jpg' }; }
